subject: Football
Gambling
Fantasy Sports
Casinos
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. and other professional leagues have been criticized for doing some business with casinos and gambling operators while prohibiting its players from taking part in events that are held at or sponsored by casinos.
snippet: The N.F.L. and other professional leagues have been criticized for doing some business with casinos and gambling operators while prohibiting its players from taking part in events that are held at or sponsored by casinos.
